integration_patterns: REST APIs for integration with EHRs

evidence.claim: Uses AWS services for its cloud infrastructure.
Complies with HIPAA regulations for handling sensitive health information.
Supports HL7 FHIR for health data interoperability.
Utilizes REST APIs to integrate with healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: Strong focus on HIPAA and X12 compliance suggests potential for API-based healthcare data exchange.
